notice.ch: 與EC7016時間序列分析 併班上課。不在分發優先順序內或名額外學生請拿密碼卡。英語授課。

remark.ch: 與EC7016時間序列分析 併班上課。不在分發優先順序內或名額外學生請拿密碼卡。英語授課。

goal.ch: The objective of this course is to provide an introduction to a few well-known econometric tools that are commonly used in applied research with data in business, economics and finance. Topics covered include ARMA models, vector autoregressions (VAR), unit roots, ARCH/GARCH models, and nonlinear time series models such as threshold and regime-switching models. A balance will be maintained between the theoretical analysis and real applications.
goal.en: The objective of this course is to provide an introduction to a few well-known econometric tools that are commonly used in applied research with data in business, economics and finance. Topics covered include ARMA models, vector autoregressions (VAR), unit roots, ARCH/GARCH models, and nonlinear time series models such as threshold and regime-switching models. A balance will be maintained between the theoretical analysis and real applications.

outline.ch:
Stationary Time Series Models (ARMA Models)
Non-Stationary Time Series Models / Unit Roots
Multivariate Time Series Models (VAR Models)
Cointegration
GVAR Models
Factor Models
Volatility Models (GARCH Models) (optional)
outline.en:
Stationary Time Series Models (ARMA Models)
Non-Stationary Time Series Models / Unit Roots
Multivariate Time Series Models (VAR Models)
Cointegration
GVAR Models
Factor Models
Volatility Models (GARCH Models) (optional)

textbook.ch:
Walter Enders, Applied Economic Time Series, 4th Edition, Wiley, 2014
Other Material
(其他參考書目)Suggested Books: 
Hamilton, J.D. (1994). Time Series Analysis, Princeton: Princeton University Press.
Tsay, R.S. (2010). Analysis of Financial Time Series, 3rd edition, Wiley.
Tsay, R.S. (2013). Multivariate Time Series Analysis: With R and Financial Applications, Wiley.
Cochrane, J (2005). Time Series for Macroeconomics and Finance. (Available from Cochrane‘s website at University of Chicago)
textbook.en:
Walter Enders, Applied Economic Time Series, 4th Edition, Wiley, 2014
Other Material

gradMethod.ch:
Problem sets (10％)
Midterm Exam (45％)
Final Exam (45％)

flexDiscription.ch:
Total 16 weeks + 2 weeks of online learning
Youtube online learning link on advanced subjects of econometrics will be assigned.
flexDiscription.en:

Youtube online learning link on advanced subjects of econometrics will be assigned.
